bibl.title: Paleopathological Evaluation and Radiological Study of 46 Egyptian Mummified Specimens in Italian Museums.
bibl.note: Some of the mummies date from the Ptolemaic or Roman period. - Introduction. - Materials and methods. - Results. - Discussion. - Conclusions.- References.
bibl.seg: Giuffra Valentina, Donata Pangoli, Paola Cosmacini, Davide Caramella, Flora Silvano, Gino Fornaciari e Rosalba Ciranni, Paleopathological Evaluation and Radiological Study of 46 Egyptian Mummified Specimens in Italian Museums.
Some of the mummies date from the Ptolemaic or Roman period. - Introduction. - Materials and methods. - Results. - Discussion. - Conclusions.- References.
Giuffra Donata Pangoli Cosmacini Caramella Sivano Fornaciari Ciranni
